sentences.sContent: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.sCn: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.sContent: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.sCn: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.sContent: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.sContent_eng: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.sCn: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

synos.tran: 吠声；任何似犬狐叫的声音

phrases.pCn: 狗朝着（对着）某人叫；对…狗吠

remMethod.val: bark还有一些动词意思是“狗吠； 咆哮； 剥树皮”

words.tran: [植] 含有树皮的；似树皮的
[木] 剥皮机；剥树皮工；杂耍、戏院前叫喊招揽观众的人

trans.tranOther: the outer covering of a tree
